Attributes.description: Cytokines and signal transduction mechanisms in the growth and differentiation of germ line, haemopoietic and other eukaryotic cells; actions of oncogene and tumor-suppressor gene products; molecular concepts derived from experimental model systems; molecular strategies of cytokine therapy.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of MICB 302, BIOC 402, BIOC 403. (Permission of course coordinator is also acceptable.)
